items.sentence: I wasn\'t surprised when Tom told me why Mary wasn\'t there.
Tom says he\'s tired of trying to convince Mary to help him.
It\'s too bad that Tom doesn\'t understand French very well.
Cocktails will be at 6:00 and dinner will be served at 6:30.
Did you have to wear a uniform when you were in high school?
Do you really believe that Tom would do something like that?
Do you really think it was Tom who gave Mary that black eye?
It\'s a shame Tom isn\'t here to see Mary receive the award.
Tom was late for class yesterday because he had an accident.
Tom asked Mary if she\'d like to walk to the beach with him.
